original_text: It was this Mary who had poured oil with a nice smell over the feet of the Lord Jesus. Then she had cleaned his feet with her hair. It was her brother Lazarus who was ill.
korean_text: 이 마리아는 향유를 주께 붓고 머리털로 주의 발을 닦던 자요 병든 나사로는 그의 오라버니더라

sentences.original_text: who had poured oil with a nice smell
sentences.korean_translation: 좋은 향기가 나는 기름을 부었던 사람

sentences.original_text: over the feet of the Lord Jesus
Then she had cleaned his feet with her hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 자신의 머리카락으로 그의 발을 닦았습니다
